messages.content: Hi
Hello! 😊 Welcome to the UET Taxila Clearance System. How can I help you with your clearance process today?
What do I need to do for clearance?

You need to get clearance from all departments: Dispensary, Hostel, Accounts, Library, Academic Department, and Alumni. Upload each document in the system. Once verified, you can download your clearance certificate from the dashboard.
How to get dispensary clearance?
Visit the university health center with your ID, get the clearance document from the dispensary staff, and upload it in the system. 😊
How to get hostel clearance?
Go to the hostel warden, get the hostel clearance document, and upload it in the system. 👍
What is the process for dues clearance?
Please visit the accounts office, clear any pending fees, get the clearance document from accounts staff, and upload it in the system.
How to get library clearance?
Return all borrowed books and pay any fines. Then collect the clearance document from the library staff and upload it in the system. 📚
Academic department clearance?
Visit your department office with your ID card. Get the clearance document from the department staff and upload it in the system. 🏫
Alumni clearance steps?
Go to the alumni office, register yourself, collect the clearance document, and upload it in the system. 🎓
What happens after all departments are cleared?
Once your uploaded documents are verified by admin staff, your clearance status will be updated to 'Cleared'. Then, you can download your clearance certificate from the dashboard.
What do I do after downloading the certificate?
After downloading your clearance certificate, take it to your department to collect your transcript. 🎓
Can you help me with hostel booking?
I'm here to help only with the clearance process. 😊 For other topics, please contact the respective department.
How to upload documents?
Go to your clearance dashboard, select the relevant department, and upload the scanned clearance document. Make sure it's clear and readable.
